items.title: Awesome Browser Extensions for Github
items.content_text: ### [Advanced GitHub Notifier (⭐82)](https://github.com/freaktechnik/advanced-github-notifier) Shows notifications when you get a new notification on GitHub and provides quick access to all notifications in a popup. Installs: 113 | Stars: 79 | Last update: 2 Jun 2023 ### [Contributors on GitHub (⭐482)](https://github.com/hzoo/contributors-on-github) Show the # of PRs and other contributors stats in the Issues/PRs tab. Can be helpful for maintainers that want to know if it's a contributor's first PR. Installs: 6 | Stars: 467 | Last update: 1 Mar 2021 ### [Enhanced GitHub (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/softvar/enhanced-github) Displays size of each file, download link and an option of copying file contents directly to clipboard Installs: 626 | Stars: 2071 | Last update: 3 Jun 2024 ### [GIFs for GitHub (⭐210)](https://github.com/N1ck/gifs-for-github) Easily search GIPHY to add a GIF into any GitHub comment box. Installs: 519 | Stars: 184 | Last update: 18 Jan 2024 ### [Git History (⭐14k)](https://github.com/pomber/git-history) Quickly browse the history of a file from any git repository. Installs: 192 | Stars: 13534 | Last update: 13 Oct 2023 ### [GitHub Code Folding (⭐292)](https://github.com/noam3127/github-code-folding) Code folding - the ability to selectively hide and display sections of a code - is an invaluable feature in many text editors and IDEs. Now, developers can utilize that same style code-folding while poring over source code on the web in GitHub. Works for any type of indentation- spaces or tabs. Installs: 104 | Stars: 289 | Last update: 25 Apr 2024 ### [GitHub Hovercard (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/Justineo/github-hovercard) Neat hovercards for GitHub. Installs: 18634 | Stars: 1822 | Last update: n/a ### [GitHub Issue Link Status (⭐301)](https://github.com/fregante/github-issue-link-status) Colorize issue and PR links to see their status (open, closed, merged). Installs: 92 | Stars: 299 | Last update: 30 Jun 2024 ### [GitHub Writer (⭐395)](https://github.com/ckeditor/github-writer) This extension adds the simplicity of WYSIWYG editing to issues, comments, pull requests, wikis and discussions in GitHub. It accepts Markdown input and offers productive writing, starting with tables. Installs: 114 | Stars: 379 | Last update: 10 Apr 2024 ### [GitZip for github (⭐41)](https://github.com/GitZip/chrome-extension) It can make the sub-directories and files of github repository as zip and download it Installs: 3358 | Stars: 38 | Last update: 21 Aug 2023 ### [Le Git Graph (⭐4.8k)](https://github.com/NirmalScaria/le-git-graph) Browser extension to add git graph to GitHub website. Installs: 449 | Stars: 3313 | Last update: 6 Aug 2024 ### [Lovely forks (⭐638)](https://github.com/musically-ut/lovely-forks) See forks with the most stars under the names of repositories. Installs: 300 | Stars: 596 | Last update: 30 Mar 2024 ### [Material Icons for Github (⭐655)](https://github.com/Claudiohbsantos/github-material-icons-extension) Show Material icons for files/folders in repository file viewer. Display the same icons from vscode-material-icon-theme VSCode extension. Installs: 792 | Stars: 491 | Last update: 11 Aug 2024 ### [Notifications Preview for GitHub (⭐147)](https://github.com/tanmayrajani/notifications-preview-github) A Chrome and Firefox extension to quickly see your notifications in a popup without leaving the current page. Installs: 58 | Stars: 141 | Last update: 16 Aug 2024 ### [Notifier for GitHub (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/notifier-for-github) Displays your GitHub notifications unread count. Supports GitHub Enterprise and an option to only show unread count for issues you're participating in. You can click the icon to quickly see your unread notifications. Installs: 518 | Stars: 1821 | Last update: 24 Apr 2024 ### [OctoLinker (⭐5.3k)](https://github.com/OctoLinker/OctoLinker) OctoLinker is the easiest and best way to navigate between files and projects on GitHub. It supports languages such as JavaScript, Ruby, Go, PHP, JAVA and more. It works with package.json as well as with Gemfiles. Installs: 12901 | Stars: 5263 | Last update: 13 Nov 2022 ### [Octotree (⭐23k)](https://github.com/ovity/octotree) Useful for developers who frequently read source in GitHub and do not want to download or checkout too many repositories. Installs: 37142 | Stars: 22752 | Last update: 9 Jun 2024 ### [Open GitHub file links in IDE (⭐75)](https://github.com/lmichelin/open-github-links-in-ide) This browser extension allows you to open files in your IDE directly from GitHub, assuming the repository you are working on is cloned on your computer. When a fragment of a file is displayed, your IDE opens the file and puts the cursor at the desired line. Installs: 34 | Stars: 71 | Last update: 23 Sep 2023 ### [PR Monitor (⭐120)](https://github.com/fwouts/prmonitor) Helps you keep track of incoming and outgoing PRs, and notifies you when you receive a pull request on GitHub. Installs: 33 | Stars: 117 | Last update: 21 Jun 2023 ### [Refined GitHub (⭐29k)](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github) Extension that simplifies the GitHub interface and adds useful features. Installs: 8201 | Stars: 24024 | Last update: 13 Aug 2024 ### [Sourcegraph](https://github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph/tree/main/client/browser) The Sourcegraph browser extension gives GitHub IDE-like powers when you're viewing code, pull requests, and diffs: 1. Go to definition 2. Find references 3. Powerful code search with regexp matching, diff searches, and other filters 4. Hover tooltips 5. File tree navigation Installs: 837 | Stars: 10035 | Last update: 14 Apr 2023 ### [eesel: The new tab for GitHub](https://www.eesel.app/) All your issues, PRs, repos and other work documents right in your new tab Installs: 113 | Stars: n/a | Last update: n/a ### [gitako - github file tree (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/enixcoda/gitako) file tree for github, and more than that. Installs: 299 | Stars: n/a | Last update: 7 Jul 2024 ### [gitpod - dev environments in a browser tab (⭐164)](https://github.com/gitpod-io/browser-extension) gitpod streamlines developer workflows by providing ready-to-code development environments in your browser - powered by vs code. Installs: 2280 | Stars: 143 | Last update: 21 Jun 2024 ### [npmhub (⭐795)](https://github.com/npmhub/npmhub) When viewing a repository on github.com that has a package.json file, this extension will introspect the dependencies in package.json and display links and description for each dependency, just below the repo's README. Installs: 72 | Stars: 758 | Last update: 26 Jul 2024
items.content_html:
Advanced GitHub Notifier (⭐82)

Shows notifications when you get a new notification on GitHub and provides quick access to all notifications in a popup.

Installs: 113 | Stars: 79 | Last update: 2 Jun 2023

Contributors on GitHub (⭐482)

Show the # of PRs and other contributors stats in the Issues/PRs tab. Can be helpful for maintainers that want to know if it's a contributor's first PR.

Installs: 6 | Stars: 467 | Last update: 1 Mar 2021

Enhanced GitHub (⭐2.2k)

Displays size of each file, download link and an option of copying file contents directly to clipboard

Installs: 626 | Stars: 2071 | Last update: 3 Jun 2024

GIFs for GitHub (⭐210)

Easily search GIPHY to add a GIF into any GitHub comment box.

Installs: 519 | Stars: 184 | Last update: 18 Jan 2024

Git History (⭐14k)

Quickly browse the history of a file from any git repository.

Installs: 192 | Stars: 13534 | Last update: 13 Oct 2023

GitHub Code Folding (⭐292)

Code folding - the ability to selectively hide and display sections of a code - is an invaluable feature in many text editors and IDEs. Now, developers can utilize that same style code-folding while poring over source code on the web in GitHub. Works for any type of indentation- spaces or tabs.

Installs: 104 | Stars: 289 | Last update: 25 Apr 2024

GitHub Hovercard (⭐1.9k)

Neat hovercards for GitHub.

Installs: 18634 | Stars: 1822 | Last update: n/a

GitHub Issue Link Status (⭐301)

Colorize issue and PR links to see their status (open, closed, merged).

Installs: 92 | Stars: 299 | Last update: 30 Jun 2024

GitHub Writer (⭐395)

This extension adds the simplicity of WYSIWYG editing to issues, comments, pull requests, wikis and discussions in GitHub. It accepts Markdown input and offers productive writing, starting with tables.

Installs: 114 | Stars: 379 | Last update: 10 Apr 2024

GitZip for github (⭐41)

It can make the sub-directories and files of github repository as zip and download it

Installs: 3358 | Stars: 38 | Last update: 21 Aug 2023

Le Git Graph (⭐4.8k)

Browser extension to add git graph to GitHub website.

Installs: 449 | Stars: 3313 | Last update: 6 Aug 2024

Lovely forks (⭐638)

See forks with the most stars under the names of repositories.

Installs: 300 | Stars: 596 | Last update: 30 Mar 2024

Material Icons for Github (⭐655)

Show Material icons for files/folders in repository file viewer. Display the same icons from vscode-material-icon-theme VSCode extension.

Installs: 792 | Stars: 491 | Last update: 11 Aug 2024

Notifications Preview for GitHub (⭐147)

A Chrome and Firefox extension to quickly see your notifications in a popup without leaving the current page.

Installs: 58 | Stars: 141 | Last update: 16 Aug 2024

Notifier for GitHub (⭐1.9k)

Displays your GitHub notifications unread count. Supports GitHub Enterprise and an option to only show unread count for issues you're participating in. You can click the icon to quickly see your unread notifications.

Installs: 518 | Stars: 1821 | Last update: 24 Apr 2024

OctoLinker (⭐5.3k)

OctoLinker is the easiest and best way to navigate between files and projects on GitHub. It supports languages such as JavaScript, Ruby, Go, PHP, JAVA and more. It works with package.json as well as with Gemfiles.

Installs: 12901 | Stars: 5263 | Last update: 13 Nov 2022

Octotree (⭐23k)

Useful for developers who frequently read source in GitHub and do not want to download or checkout too many repositories.

Installs: 37142 | Stars: 22752 | Last update: 9 Jun 2024

Open GitHub file links in IDE (⭐75)

This browser extension allows you to open files in your IDE directly from GitHub, assuming the repository you are working on is cloned on your computer. When a fragment of a file is displayed, your IDE opens the file and puts the cursor at the desired line.

Installs: 34 | Stars: 71 | Last update: 23 Sep 2023

PR Monitor (⭐120)

Helps you keep track of incoming and outgoing PRs, and notifies you when you receive a pull request on GitHub.

Installs: 33 | Stars: 117 | Last update: 21 Jun 2023

Refined GitHub (⭐29k)

Extension that simplifies the GitHub interface and adds useful features.

Installs: 8201 | Stars: 24024 | Last update: 13 Aug 2024

Sourcegraph

The Sourcegraph browser extension gives GitHub IDE-like powers when you're viewing code, pull requests, and diffs:

  1. Go to definition
  2. Find references
  3. Powerful code search with regexp matching, diff searches, and other filters
  4. Hover tooltips
  5. File tree navigation

Installs: 837 | Stars: 10035 | Last update: 14 Apr 2023

eesel: The new tab for GitHub

All your issues, PRs, repos and other work documents right in your new tab

Installs: 113 | Stars: n/a | Last update: n/a

gitako - github file tree (⭐2.5k)

file tree for github, and more than that.

Installs: 299 | Stars: n/a | Last update: 7 Jul 2024

gitpod - dev environments in a browser tab (⭐164)

gitpod streamlines developer workflows by providing ready-to-code development environments in your browser - powered by vs code.

Installs: 2280 | Stars: 143 | Last update: 21 Jun 2024

npmhub (⭐795)

When viewing a repository on github.com that has a package.json file, this extension will introspect the dependencies in package.json and display links and description for each dependency, just below the repo's README.

Installs: 72 | Stars: 758 | Last update: 26 Jul 2024

items.title: Awesome Naming
items.content_text:
### Tools, Applications, Libraries, Frameworks

*   [CockroachDB](https://web.archive.org/web/20150514123425/http://www.wired.co.uk/news/archive/2014-07/22/cockroachdb) - Database application, that is marketed as being so fault tolerant and resilient as a cockroach.
items.content_html:
Tools, Applications, Libraries, Frameworks

  • CockroachDB - Database application, that is marketed as being so fault tolerant and resilient as a cockroach.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Abduction / Applications in AI

*   [Human Comprehensible Active Learning of Genome-Scale Metabolic Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.12740) - ***AAAI Spring Symposium Series 2023 on Computational Scientific Discovery***, 2023. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=10875437066608527790)]. \[[Extended Abstract](http://cogsys.org/symposium/discovery-2023/abstracts/Abstract_3169.pdf)]. \[[Slides](http://cogsys.org/symposium/discovery-2023/talks/Ai.pdf)]. This work introduces a novel machine learning framework ILP-iML1515 based on Inductive Logic Programming (ILP) that performs abductive logical reasoning and actively learns from training examples. The ILP-iML1515 framework 1) allows high-throughput simulations and 2) actively selects experiments that reduce the experimental cost of learning gene functions in comparison to randomly selected experiments.
items.content_html:
Abduction / Applications in AI

  • Human Comprehensible Active Learning of Genome-Scale Metabolic Networks - AAAI Spring Symposium Series 2023 on Computational Scientific Discovery, 2023. [All Versions]. [Extended Abstract]. [Slides]. This work introduces a novel machine learning framework ILP-iML1515 based on Inductive Logic Programming (ILP) that performs abductive logical reasoning and actively learns from training examples. The ILP-iML1515 framework 1) allows high-throughput simulations and 2) actively selects experiments that reduce the experimental cost of learning gene functions in comparison to randomly selected experiments.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [bepoptimist (⭐1)](https://github.com/sheoak/zsh-bepoptimist/) Remaps vi-mode for the French [bépo](http://bepo.fr/wiki/Accueil) keyboard.
*   [snr (⭐1)](https://github.com/raisedadead/zsh-snr) - Passes the selected output of the first command to the next.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • bepoptimist (⭐1) Remaps vi-mode for the French bépo keyboard.
  • snr (⭐1) - Passes the selected output of the first command to the next.

items.title: Awesome Sysadmin
items.content_text:
### Software / VPN

*   [Gluetun VPN client (⭐10k)](https://github.com/qdm12/gluetun) -  VPN client in a thin Docker container for multiple VPN providers, written in Go, and using OpenVPN or Wireguard, DNS over TLS, with a few proxy servers built-in.  `MIT` `docker`
items.content_html:
Software / VPN

  • Gluetun VPN client (⭐10k) - VPN client in a thin Docker container for multiple VPN providers, written in Go, and using OpenVPN or Wireguard, DNS over TLS, with a few proxy servers built-in. MIT docker

items.title: Awesome Php
items.content_text:
### Configuration / Miscellaneous

*   [Laravel Serializable Closure (⭐575)](https://github.com/laravel/serializable-closure) - A library that allows Closures to be serialized.
items.content_html:
Configuration / Miscellaneous

  • Laravel Serializable Closure (⭐575) - A library that allows Closures to be serialized.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Recipe Management

*   [Tamari](https://tamariapp.com) - Recipe manager web app with a built-in collection of recipes. Organize by favorites and categories, create shopping lists, and plan meals. ([Demo](https://app.tamariapp.com), [Source Code (⭐100)](https://github.com/alexbates/Tamari)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker/Python`

### Software / Web Servers

*   [BunkerWeb](https://www.bunkerweb.io) - Next-gen Web Application Firewall (WAF) that will protect your web services. ([Demo](https://demo.bunkerweb.io), [Source Code (⭐8.7k)](https://github.com/bunkerity/bunkerweb), [Clients](https://docs.bunkerweb.io/latest/plugins/)) `AGPL-3.0` `deb/Docker/K8S/Python`
items.content_html:
Software / Recipe Management

  • Tamari - Recipe manager web app with a built-in collection of recipes. Organize by favorites and categories, create shopping lists, and plan meals. (Demo, Source Code (⭐100)) GPL-3.0 Docker/Python

Software / Web Servers

  • BunkerWeb - Next-gen Web Application Firewall (WAF) that will protect your web services. (Demo, Source Code (⭐8.7k), Clients) AGPL-3.0 deb/Docker/K8S/Python

items.title: Awesome Langchain
items.content_text:
